4:
7 ways to use aText:
Type snippet's abbreviation
Type snippet group's abbreviation
Press snippet's HotKey
Press snippet group's HotKey
Use Search snippet HotKey (in Preferences → HotKeys)
Use Show snippet menu HotKey (in Preferences → HotKeys)
Enable snippet group's Float on screen option to use Floating menu
5:
7 ways to use aText:

  • Type snippet's abbreviation
  • Type snippet group's abbreviation
  • Press snippet's HotKey
  • Press snippet group's HotKey
  • Use Search snippet HotKey (in Preferences → HotKeys)
  • Use Show snippet menu HotKey (in Preferences → HotKeys)
  • Enable snippet group's Float on screen option to use Floating menu
